title: The Shores of the CritPond™
content:
[[include component:ratio-bar base=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:ratio-bar pie=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[div style="background: gray; padding: 1px 15px; border: solid 3px lightgray; margin: 10px; border-radius: 30px 15px;"]]

[[div style="background: white; padding: 1px 15px; border: solid 3px lightgray; margin: 10px; border-radius: 30px 15px;"]]

The legendary Zoobeeny lurks deep within the dangerous lands of Das Critters feasting upon shattered hopes and crushed dreams. At Das Critters' deepest point lies the CritPond™. Many a brave adventurer have attempted to acquire the hidden treasure of the CritPond™ known as... ##green|The Greenlight##. Those who attempt to do so must challenge Zoobeeny to ritual combat of which there shall be only one survivor (or two in the case Zoobeeny loses).

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

------

Anyways, I'm Zoobeeny. I write occasionally and crit things. Been on the wiki since 2020 and uh, yeah. That's it. I'm kinda boring. :]

And without further ado, I present... MY STUFF! (with more stuff coming. Hopefully.)

(If you're looking for my crit list, click here: [https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/zoobeenycritlist The Crit List])

[[tabview]]

[[tab SCP Articles]]

[[[SCP-6229]]] - Till Bonds Break
My first SCP article! Technically. Rewrote it several months after its original post, now with 50% more cohesive narrative! Much prouder of this version of the article than the first. The original had villains appear randomly, little characterization, and was overall less engaging than I had wanted. The rewrite has better everything, objectively. 

------

[[[SCP-4238]]] - The Child, the Monster, and the Angel
My second SCP article and written in the spur of the moment (for the most part). Actually pretty happy with this one. Features a lot of physical child abuse, but not from personal experience. I just wanted to write something that had a lot of inherent darkness but still have an overall tone of hope and a rather happy ending.

[[/tab]]

[[tab Tales]]

[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/in-which-catgirls-are-shot-probably In Which Catgirls Are Shot. Probably.]
My first ever article on the site, written and conceived in a single day, for ColdpostCon, involving a guy, several catgirls, a reality-bending neckbeard, and possibly... a gun.
This was written while in the middle of writing 6229 because I figured, "instead of dealing with the social anxiety of asking for critique, let me just coldpost with permission." It appears it did alright, so that's a win in my book.

[[/tab]]

[[/tabview]]
[[=]]
[[collapsible show ="Simplified Table" hide="Begone Table! >:O"]]
[[/=]]
Table of stuff by me, mostly for me to use :D
